title: Gesture-Enhanced Pedagogy for Understanding Statistical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Conceptual Understanding of Basic Statistical Terms (Mean, Standard Deviation, etc.)
context.additional_context: Social science data interpretation competency enhancement for managerial staff, utilizing smartphone supplementary materials in limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between mean and standard deviation using gestures through real-world case studies.
Learners integrate two concepts when interpreting statistical scenarios using gesture-based visual explanations
Learners write analytical reports applying statistical concepts in organizational decision-making contexts through project-based tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
